itunes.summary: Solid Joys is a daily devotional written and read by John Piper. These short and substantive readings will feed your joy in Jesus every day of the year. Discover more from Piper at desiringGod.org.
itunes.author: Desiring God

itunes.summary: It is good not to talk very long about God without talking to God. Frequently interrupt your talking about God by talking to God.
